overview: Just hold your breath. Perhaps this helps as much against the pain of parting as the stinging nettles of oneâ€™s childhood. Sheila died of hay dust in her lungs and it seems as if the family farm died with the horse, too. After its sale, the laconic narrator pays digital visits via 3D online maps. But even the most detailed view says nothing about the grave of the three-legged farm cat. Using animation and image manipulation, he reclaims the remembered place.
title: Hoamweh Lung
